text.newUserMessage: * Welcome! Your phone number is private and will not be shared, but your conversations may be used for art. Reply QUIT at any time to stop receiving messages.
text.newConversationMessage: * Say hello! You are now talking to a stranger. Be nice, don't be creepy. At any time, reply NEW for a new stranger, or reply QUIT to disconnect.
text.userDeactivatedMessage: Thank you for participating! Text this number again later if you'd to try again.
text.userReactivatedMessage: You've rejoined Talk to Strangers; reply QUIT to leave, or NEW for a new stranger.
